events.title: Carolina Panthers v Los Angeles Rams
events.description: Bank of America Stadium was designed for fans of all ages. Please note that every child over the age of 12 months is required to have a game ticket to enter the stadium. Any child under the age of 12 months admitted without a ticket must share a seat with an accompanying adult. Please be aware that this event is subject to NFL flexible scheduling procedures. The date and time for some games may change from what is currently reflected on the schedule and from what may appear on the ticket. For more detailed information regarding scheduling for the 2025 NFL Season, please visit https://www.nfl.com/schedules/flexible-scheduling-procedures

events.title: Panthers VIP Tailgate v. Rams at South Lawn Village
events.description: The Ultimate Tailgate Experience for the 2025-26 Panthers Season Located in South Lawn directly NEXT to Bank of America Stadium If you are a diehard Panthers fan and you want a VIP tailgating experience, check out the Panthers VIP Tailgate game day experience. Open three hours prior to kickoff for Panthers and opposing team fans. Come watch the ESPN pre-game breakdown All food and drinks (bar) are included in price All you can eat premium food stations exclusively created by Food Network Celebrity Chef Aaron May Live DJ Music Xbox gaming area inside the Panthers VIP tailgate

events.title: Registix Reserve Access NOT a Game Ticket - Rams v Panthers
events.description: THIS IS NOT A GAME TICKET. A separate game ticket is required to enter the stadium before entering The Registix Reserve. Enjoy an all-inclusive bar with craft cocktails, beer, wine, and numerous culinary options with premium entrees, snacks, and desserts. Get as close to the action as possible from field-side access. Watch players warm up steps away in pregame and feel the pulse of all the action throughout the game. The Registix Reserve can be accessed from when stadium gates open until (60) minutes after the game's conclusion.

events.title: Franklin Presents: My Christmas
events.description: This year, Vince Guaraldis iconic jazz album A Charlie Brown Christmas turns 60. Join us as we reimagine the classic tracks through the lens of the fictional Franklin character from Charles Schultzs Peanuts. This one night only, all ages event will fuse soulful reinterpretations, contemporary jazz, and funk infused arrangements to honor the original work while offering a vibrant new take. This production celebrates not just a cherished album, but a broader legacy of visibility, creativity, and inclusion in American culture. We will see you on December 6th at 8 pm at the new Carolina Theatre as we bring you a night of unforgettable Holiday magic.
